name: Parts Needed
description:
This project was created through the Games and Interactive Media major at Azusa Pacific University. Play as an astronaut that hit space debris on the way back home. They made an emergency landing on a near by planet that is home to an abandoned space station.  Help them get back home by collecting parts left over on an old space station.  

Instructions: 

  • Use your heavy weight gravity boots to calculate how you fall in the game. 
  • Use up and down arrow keys for the ladders.
  • Use left and right arrow keys to run throughout the game. 
  • Hitting enemies will cost you a life and start you from the beginning of the level. (When all three lives are gone it restarts game.) 
  • Collect a part each level to win the game. (4 total)
